about_the_game:
【Bouncing Music】can create random music by drawing different types of blocks and using the collision of marbles.
Through the guidance of levels. you will gradually master how to create music on this music canvas. The physical trajectory prediction function provided in the game can also assist in the creation of wonderful music visualization works. Through the jumping marble, you can see the rhythm in the music.
Bouncing music is an experimental game trying to explore the connection between visuals and music, more new features stay tuned ：）


【How to Play】
● Auralization
There are different type of blocks you can draw. The length of the block determine the pitch of the sound. When the marble hit the blocks, sound will be triggered . So you can create a unique music by law of gravity.
.

● Visualization
You don't have to be a music export to create beautiful music. With the midi import feature. You can use a lot of classic music to assist your creation. Music can be transformed into visual elements. You can design a path and create beautiful visualzation animations very easily.

.

● Level Mode
There are some levels to guide you how to create music or animation . It will reveal the subtle relationship between visuals and music.The more levels you finish, more feature will unlock.
.
